mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, SELLER_NO, CATEGORY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, LESSON_CONTENT, CAREER, BOARD_CONTENT, COUNT, BOARD_WRITER, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, COST, ST_DATE, FN_DATE) VALUES( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{sellerNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{lessonContent}, #{career}, #{boardContent}, DEFAULT, #{boardWriter}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{cost}, #{stDate}, #{fnDate})

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, UPLOAD_DATE, FILE_LEVEL, STATUS)
VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, DEFAULT, #{fileLevel}, DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, UPLOAD_DATE, FILE_LEVEL, STATUS)
VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, DEFAULT, #{fileLevel}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} AND CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle} AND LESSON_CONTENT = #{lessonContent} AND CAREER = #{career} AND BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent} AND BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter} AND COST = #{cost} AND ST_DATE = #{stDate} AND FN_DATE = #{fnDate}
SELECT B.*, S.GRADE_NO FROM BOARD B, SELLER S WHERE S.SELLER_NO = B.SELLER_NO AND BOARD_NO = ${ boardNo }
SELECT MAINCATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C, BOARD B WHERE C.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO AND BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, COST, BOARD_WRITER, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND SELLER_NO = ${sellerNo} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${startRow} AND ${endRow}
